parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_project">
    <attribute name="leidos_projectid" />
    <filter type="and">
      <filter type="or">
        <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="in">
          <value>445260010</value>
          <value>445260002</value>
          <value>445260013</value>
          <value>445260007</value>
          <value>445260017</value>
          <value>445260001</value>
           <value>445260011</value>
        </condition>
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="2" />
          <condition attribute="leidos_projectcompletedate" operator="yesterday" />
        </filter>
      </filter>
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

Perform_a_bound_action.description: uses process leidos_CalculateProjectTotalSpend which calls N52 aLH
